definition: definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]

sentences.english: This is not just the direct result of Chernobyl.
sentences.chinese: 這並不只是切爾諾貝利事故的直接後果。

sentences.english: The levels were about twice as high as the threshold for declaring areas uninhabitable around Chernobyl.
sentences.chinese: 這一級別高於切爾諾貝利周圍死區兩倍。

sentences.english: So what have we learnt from Chernobyl?
sentences.chinese: 因此，我們從切爾諾貝利學到了什麼呢？

sentences.english: The roads connect Chernobyl and Pripyat with control posts.
sentences.chinese: 這些公路將切爾諾貝利和Pripyat聯繫起來。
